It’s time to make democracy possible again.

Our Idea

A National Referendum

For Equality as Citizens

We must fix the rigged system. First.

82% of Americans believe the system is rigged. Before we listen to more politicians’ promises, we must find a way to un-rig that rigged system. Here is our plan.

Our Idea

A National Referendum

For Equality as Citizens

How a Referendum Works

A referendum is “We, the People” speaking, so that “They, the Congress” must listen. Our Constitution doesn’t give us a power of a referendum, but we’ve found a hack to put one on the ballot in 2016.

Our Idea

A National Referendum

For Equality as Citizens

The Citizen Equality Act of 2017

The core principle of representative democracy is that we are all equal citizens. Corruption creates 2nd class citizens.  The Citizen Equality Act of 2017 would fix that, and a referendum president would have the mandate to pass it. Once it is passed, we could begin to rebuild a democracy that inspires free people everywhere, and gives us a government that works again. Three core principles:

  Equal freedom to vote

  Equal representation

  Citizen Funded Elections

Learn more about the Citizen Equality Act of 2017
